name: GOAT Group
headline: Platform for the greatest products from the past, present and future.
description:
GOAT Group represents the leading platforms for authentic sneakers, apparel and accessories. Operating four distinct brands–GOAT, Flight Club, Grailed and alias–GOAT Group has a global community of over 50M members across 170 countries.

We are backed by some of the leading names in venture capital including Accel Partners, Andreessen Horowitz, Index Ventures, Matrix Partners, NEA, SV Angel, Upfront Ventures, Webb Investment Network and Y Combinator.

generated_description:
**GOAT Group: A Marketplace for Authenticity**

Founded in 2015 as part of Y Combinator's W11 batch, GOAT Group has positioned itself as a key player in the resale marketplace, specializing in authentic sneakers, apparel, and accessories. Taglined as "Platform for the greatest products from the past, present, and future," their mission underscores a commitment to delivering genuine products to their broad audience.

Headquartered in Los Angeles, CA, GOAT Group operates through four distinct brands: GOAT, Flight Club, Grailed, and alias. Together, these brands have cultivated a global community of over 60 million members spanning across 170 countries—a testament to their influence in the marketplace. 

The company has attracted substantial investment from notable venture capital firms, including Accel Partners, Andreessen Horowitz, Index Ventures, and Y Combinator, among others. With a team of about 1,600 employees, GOAT Group combines a robust operational force with a visionary approach, pushing the boundaries of what a marketplace can offer.

For more information, visit their [website](https://www.goatgroup.com/) or check out their [news](https://www.goatgroup.com/</news>) and [careers](https://www.goatgroup.com/<https:/boards.greenhouse.io/goatgroup>) pages.
